name: Iconcube
description: ourcing Partner for Web hosting  company
overview:
Servicing as an Outsourcing Partner for Web Hosting Industry.

We provides IT outsourcing solutions particularly focused on web hosting & datacenters. Our mind revolves around designing the applications and management solutions for web Hosting industry. We act as business partner by mapping your partnership objective with us appropriate engagement model. We offers customized engagement models by just providing the needed software for management or handling the complete management. We employ the best resources coupled with updated technological solutions to provide you the effective team. We have designed our processes in such a way that it leads to maximum returns at minimum cost.

We are pioneer in providing Server Management, Datacenter Management, Migration Services and other related services to the web hosters & datacenters. We are the certified partner of Softlayer (listed as ZNetsupport). IconCube holds its specialization in the web hosting industry with its 10 yrs old sister concern as ZNet Technologies (India’s Top Web Hosting Provider).
